1.name: Scarface
1.description: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

2.name: The Outsiders
2.description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

3.name: Christine
3.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

4.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
4.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

5.name: Superman III
5.description: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

6.name: National Lampoon's Vacation
6.description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

7.name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
7.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

8.name: Risky Business
8.description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

9.name: Never Say Never Again
9.description: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

10.name: Flashdance
10.description: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

11.name: Cujo
11.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

12.name: Terms of Endearment
12.description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

13.name: Silkwood
13.description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

14.name: WarGames
14.description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

15.name: Sleepaway Camp
15.description: Angela Baker, a traumatized and very shy young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

16.name: The Big Chill
16.description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

17.name: The Right Stuff
17.description: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

18.name: Octopussy
18.description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

19.name: Trading Places
19.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

20.name: Psycho II
20.description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

21.name: Krull
21.description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

22.name: The Dead Zone
22.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

23.name: Easy Money
23.description: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

24.name: Rumble Fish
24.description: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

25.name: Videodrome
25.description: When he acquires a different kind of show for his station, a sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a terrifying new reality.

26.name: Star 80
26.description: A successful young model finds trouble when her obsessive manager-turned-husband becomes dangerously jealous. Based on the true story of 1980 Playmate of the Year Dorothy Stratten.

27.name: Bad Boys
27.description: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

28.name: A Christmas Story
28.description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

29.name: Mr. Mom
29.description: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

30.name: Jaws 3-D
30.description: The sons of police chief Brody must protect customers at a SeaWorld theme park after a thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in the park with them.

31.name: Nostalgia
31.description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

32.name: Valley Girl
32.description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

33.name: The Meaning of Life
33.description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

34.name: Fire and Ice
34.description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

35.name: Private School
35.description: Christine (Phoebe Cates), a student at an exclusive all-girls private school, is in love with Jim, who attends an academy for boys nearby. Christine's arch rival Jordan also has her eye on ...                See full summary »

36.name: The Hunger
36.description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

37.name: Sudden Impact
37.description: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

38.name: Local Hero
38.description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

39.name: Deathstalker
39.description: The warrior Deathstalker is tasked by an old witch to obtain and unite the three powers of creation - a chalice, an amulet, and a sword - lest the evil magician Munkar get them and use them...                See full summary »

40.name: Class
40.description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

41.name: Losin' It
41.description: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

42.name: Lone Wolf McQuade
42.description: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

43.name: Staying Alive
43.description: It's five years later and Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet - succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

44.name: My Tutor
44.description: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

45.name: Blue Thunder
45.description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

46.name: Brainstorm
46.description: Researchers develop a system where they can jump into people's minds. But when people involved bring their personal problems into the equation, it becomes dangerous - perhaps deadly.

47.name: Suburbia
47.description: When household tensions and a sense of worthlessness overcome Evan, he finds escape when he clings with the orphans of a throw-away society.

48.name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
48.description: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

49.name: D.C. Cab
49.description: The tale of a hapless group of cabbies and a rundown cab company owned by Harold. Albert comes to town with a dream of starting his own cab company but needs to motivate Harold's employees ...                See full summary »

50.name: All the Right Moves
50.description: A high school football player desperate for a scholarship and his headstrong coach clash in a dying Pennsylvania steel town.
